channel.title: CVE Feed for The Foreman Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Foreman Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-14623|2024-08-05T09:29:51.865Z -- the%20foreman%20project -- katello
item.description: A SQL injection flaw was found in katello's errata-related API. An authenticated remote attacker can craft input data to force a malformed SQL query to the backend database, which will leak internal IDs. This is issue is related to an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-3072. Version 3.10 and older is vulnerable.
